sentences.sContent: This kind of plasticity may play a vital role in evolution as well as during the lifetime of individuals.
sentences.sContent_eng: This kind of plasticity may play a vital role in evolution as well as during the lifetime of individuals.
sentences.sCn: 这种可塑性不仅贯穿生命个体的一生，也许对进化也产生了至关重要的作用。

sentences.sContent: Whether we choose to do this or not is a matter of broader social and ethical debate over our growing ability to fiddle with the plasticity of the brain.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whether we choose to do this or not is a matter of broader social and ethical debate over our growing ability to fiddle with the plasticity of the brain.
sentences.sCn: 我们选择这样做还是不这样做，是个更广泛的社会的和伦理的论辩，这一论辩涉及到我们日益增长的、改变大脑可塑性的能力。

synos.tran: [力][材]塑性，可塑性；适应性；柔软性

phrases.pCn: 塑性指数；增塑指数；塑性值

words.tran: 塑料的；（外科）造型的；可塑的

trans.tranOther: the quality of being easily made into any shape, and of staying in that shape until someone changes it
